articles.description: 'Brown Sugar' was criticized for 'glorifying slavery'
articles.content:
(Newser)
After 50 years, the Rolling Stones have dropped one of their biggest—and most controversial—songs from their set list. With its references to slavery, mentions of whipping, and lyrics like … [+1789 chars]

articles.description: In his first documentary, filmmaker Todd Haynes uses the language of experimental cinema to spotlight the Velvet Underground, a legendary band that flowered within New York's avant-garde art world.

articles.description: The new miniseries, adapted from journalist Beth Macy's critically acclaimed book, shows opioid addiction ravaging one rural Virginia town.

articles.title: Dave Chappelle's Netflix special gets 96% user rating on Rotten Tomatoes - scores 43% among critics - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dave Chappelle's controversial Netflix The Closer special has received rave reviews from viewers online, garnering a 96% user rating on Rotten Tomatoes, but scored just 43% with critics.
articles.content: Dave Chappelle's controversial Netflix special The Closer has scored 96 per cent positive reviews from regular viewers on Rotten Tomatoes - but just 43 per cent from woke critics, many of whom have a… [+12794 chars]
